## Task2

```{r}
set.seed(10)
n<-100
x<-runif(n)
resp<-3+10*x+rnorm(n)

pred<- predict(lm(resp~ x),data.frame(x))


getRMSE<- function(a,b,c){
  diff=(a-b)^2
  mse=sqrt(1/c(sum(diff)))
  return(mse)
}


getRMSE(resp,pred,n)
```

```{r}
getMAE<- function(a,b,c){
  diff=abs(a-b)
  mae=1/c(sum(diff))
  return(mae)
}


getMAE(resp,pred,n)
```
